Capecci Communications

Website

John Capecci is a good friend of ours and a talented writer, trainer and overall communicator. We worked together to create a new website that uses copy and imagery economically and elegantly to show the range of his work and capture his personality. Simplicity takes careful consideration. We experimented with a number of design directions, color palettes and styles of illustration and are really pleased with how this clean, colorful beauty full of white space turned out.
